text:
If you use Adobe Typekit, you'd need to add it as a custom font in the child.css

Cc: <@UATE4ATHP> SR custom font question

Here are some instructions for using custom fonts.

<https://docs.sprocketrocket.co/theme/custom-fonts|https://docs.sprocketrocket.co/theme/custom-fonts>

Feel free to DM me or <https://docs.sprocketrocket.co/support/submit-a-ticket|contact us> if you have  any other questions :slightly_smiling_face:
